attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: It took multiple hours to download and when it did download it gave my phone a virus! I had to buy an entirely new iPhone and will NOT be redownloding. Worst app every by far. I think it did that because I'm Mexican tbh. It REALLY did that... but just don't do it again 🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: boomer remover
attributes.review: someone really needs to rethink the apps purpose. for starters it took 3 weeks and 12 days to download. and with that not being good enough once i did open it. my phone froze and then started acting up. my whole phone took a turn and would die every time i tried to open the app. i guess my phone could just really tell what apps are important and which ones arnt. 🧚🏻‍♀️together we can take over the app store. and the us :)🥰😘

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: You know, I tried. But this was straight garage🤢. This president is terrible. Give us Obama back. Send help. Our president is the reason we are where we are. Oh wait I forgot this is an app review. Either way, both are trash and would not recommend.

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible
attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible!!! I don’t get why it took it 5 weeks to download. I have plenty of space and my iCloud isn’t full either. There’s so many other reasons I would not recommend this app to ANYONE.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app doesn’t work at all Everytime I try to open it it just closes its so bad never get cause it will never work and the download process takes forever it took me 6 days for it to download terrible app

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: the app doesn’t work right, really glitchy, doesn’t provide as it said it would. i was very disappointed once i opened the app, my standards weren’t very high in the first place but still managed to go below them.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: This app took 7 hours to download, and then as soon as it was finished and I opened it I was presented with a message telling me that I can’t use it because I’m a LGBTQ+ Poc!!! Anyway, just take it off the App Store already, it’s so glitchy that no one could possibly want it.

attributes.title: Horrible app don’t download it
attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app it took a month to download ,and when it did my phone started glitching getting some sort of a virus .I took my phone to get checked on and the the said it was this horrible app . ABSOLUTELY RUINED MY LIFE 😡

attributes.title: HUGE LETDOWN
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and was really excited considering it’s Donald Trump, basically I do everything it tells me and get sent a link and I clicked on the link and GOT HACKED Convinced this app isn’t legit and NEEDS to be taken down, all these other reviews for sure agree with me 🤦🏽‍♂️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: wow, what a horrible experience. you open the app and there’s this disgusting image of some dude with a really weird spray tan and some grossly puffy eye bags. then, you have to put a phone number in?!!! what kind of america is this? there should never be this level of atrocity on such a vile app✨☺️🧚💕
